description:
If you can create a Facebook profile, you can take this course.

If you're a freelancer, contractor, consultant, job seeker, or employed but open to job opportunities this course is a must to build your visibility.

You should take this course and create a professional website right now to:

  • Achieve career security in a world where job security no longer exists.
  • Skip gatekeepers, talk directly to the hiring manager every time.
  • Get a personalized domain & website to show off on your LinkedIn profile, resume/CV, email signature, and more!
  • Be found by recruiters, there's nothing more satisfying than being headhunted.
  • Have a loyal reader of your blog hire you for your dream job.
  • Make hidden job opportunities appear and be seeked out for these opportunities.
  • Have examples of your work to show so you qualify for higher paying work.
  • Get a back-stage tour of how to achieve the success I did.

The outcome of this course has increased my salary by $15000 USD per year and I've achieved my dream of working from home.

After completing this course you'll be able to:

  • Create a website for professional success or a business.
  • Achieve financial freedom.
  • Open doors to previously unreachable opportunities.
  • Tap into the hidden job market by networking and easily building trust.

I'll share with you the website I built over the past 5 years so you can achieve it in less than a day.

Course Overview

My engaging, interactive teaching style will help you be successful.

I cover the following:

  • Custom domains and website hosting.
  • Install Wordpress and making it unique to you.
  • Plugins to make your website irresistible.
  • Create great content to achieve your goals.
  • Maintain your website and secure it.
  • Evolving your website with your career.

I use the following tools:

  • GoDaddy Hosting ($42 USD)
  • Wordpress (Free)
  • WPZoom StartingUp Theme ($75 USD) some parts of the course are specific to WPZoom themes
  • Professional website that gets you work (priceless)
title: Get a Better Job With a Professional Online Portfolio & Blog
